title: unesco_heritage_Bronze_Age_Burial_Site_of_Sammallahdenmäki
text:
Name: Bronze Age Burial Site of Sammallahdenmäki. short_description:

This Bronze Age burial site features more than 30 granite burial cairns, providing a unique insight into the funerary practices and social and religious structures of northern Europe more than three millennia ago.

. date_inscribed: 1999. danger: 0. date_end: . longitude: 21.7775. latitude: 61.12056. area_hectares: 0. category_long: Cultural. category_short: C. Country name: Finland. Region: Europe and North America. iso_code: fi. transboundary: 0. rev_bis: Rev.
